title: UPPAbaby 2015 G-Link Stroller
text: Feed Services   The G-Link allows you to stroll wth two, whether it be twins or a 2nd child. Independent reclining wheels and adjustable support rests allows you to keep them comfy at different angles. It's lightweight frame allows you to take the stairs with a breeze and fold it up easily. This stroller is compatible from birth to the toddler years. Features: Lightweight aluminum frame with side-by-side seats Infant Support System -- Fully reclined seat combined with an infant head support and mesh foot enclosure for travel from birth Independent one-handed adjustable recline with four positions Individual adjustable footrests Large canopies with extendable SPF 50+ sunshade four sets of wheels vs. six for optimal maneuverability Single-action brake Lockable front wheels for added stability High-performance, 5.75" diameter wheels Simple, quick fold - No foot action required Stands when folded Large, easy-access basket Removable cup holder included 29" x 30" x 42"
